translations: v．擅自占有，霸占；冒称，僭越：无权地占有或索取某物，通常是通过强硬或不正当手段。
· He arrogates the right to make decisions for others.

sentences.sentence: Not poets alone, nor artists, nor that superior order of mind which arrogates to itself all refinement, feel this, but dogs and all men.
sentences.translation: 不仅诗人，艺术家以及那些自命不凡、思想杰出的人觉得如此，连狗和普通人也有同感。
